page.title: 09Ecology
page.content: The atmosphere in our area is a lot dirtier, because of the fumes that travel from a nearby motorway.The{ {wildlife}is also dying off because of {pesticides}and pollution.Round our school the grass has gone brown because of the farmers{pesticides. People can remember when{footpaths could be clearly seen and were mainly mud tracks.Marr church yard is a haven for wildflowers e.g. primroses, wild violets and cowslips. In our area the main part of{wildlife}is bird life,the commonest bird is the starling,the rarest bird is the curlew.Many birds of prey in our area are found on the motorway.We have left part of our field to go wild and have sent for some wild flower seeds to plant.The seeds will be planted in the Autumn so that butterflies and insects will be attracted to a safe area for them.
